3.2.0.name: axios-retry
3.2.0.description: Axios plugin that intercepts failed requests and retries them whenever posible.

scripts.push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags

3.2.1.name: axios-retry
3.2.1.description: Axios plugin that intercepts failed requests and retries them whenever posible.

scripts.build: rm -rf lib && babel es -d lib/esm --source-maps && babel es -d lib/cjs --config-file ./babel.config.cjs.json --source-maps && ./fixup
scripts.push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags

3.2.2.name: axios-retry
3.2.2.description: Axios plugin that intercepts failed requests and retries them whenever posible.

scripts.build: rm -rf lib && babel es -d lib/esm --source-maps && babel es -d lib/cjs --config-file ./babel.config.cjs.json --source-maps && ./fixup
scripts.push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
